title: [1508521049] Roasted Rolled Pork Loin with Lemon and Sage - Gordon Ramsay
description:
This is the most tender part of the pig. Rich and sumptuous - if cooked right (slightly pink) it never disappoints.
From Gordon Ramsay’s The F Word

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
